title: Hydro Dam Water Level Monitoring
description: An operator at a hydroelectric dam needs to assess current water levels and inflow forecasts to plan generation for the coming week.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current reservoir water level and compare it to historical seasonal averages.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reports the water level is 5% above the seasonal average.

tasks.description: Get the 7-day forecast for precipitation and river inflow into the reservoir.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a forecast showing significant rainfall is expected.

tasks.description: Recommend a generation schedule that increases output to manage the expected inflow while respecting environmental flow requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides an hourly generation plan for the next 7 days.
